    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_78488</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78488</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Splitting of the mass of uranium-235</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbindungsaufspaltung der Masse von uranium-235</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se dédoubler de la masse d'uranium-235</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rachar da massa de uranium-235</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spaccando della massa di uranium-235</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαχωρισμός της μάζας ουράνιο- 235</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El partir de la masa de uranium-235</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the mass of uranium-235 can be split into two smaller masses represented by a gun with an explosive (object A) and a spherical body (object B).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">explosives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">initiator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutron source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sub-critical masses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">supercritical masses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">uranium</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die Masse von 
uranium-235 in zwei kleinere Massen aufgespaltet werden kann, die 
durch eine Gewehr mit einem Explosivstoff dargestellt werden 
(Nachricht A) und ein kugelförmiger Körper (Nachricht B).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que la masse 
d'uranium-235 peut être coupée en deux plus petites masses 
représentées par un pistolet avec un explosif (objet A) et un corps 
sphérique (objet B).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a massa de 
uranium-235 pode ser rachada em duas massas menores representadas por 
um injetor com um explosivo (objeto A) e um corpo esférico (objeto 
B).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che la massa di 
uranium-235 può essere divisa in due più piccole masse rappresentate
da una pistola con un esplosivo (oggetto A) e un corpo sferico 
(oggetto B).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι η μάζα ουράνιο- 
235 μπορεί να χωριστεί σε δύο μικρότερες μάζες που 
αντιπροσωπεύονται από ένα πυροβόλο όπλο με μια εκρηκτική ύλη 
(αντικείμενο Α) και ένα σφαιρικό σώμα (αντικείμενο Β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la masa de 
uranium-235 se puede partir en dos masas más pequeñas representadas 
por un arma con un explosivo (objeto A) y un cuerpo esférico (objeto 
B).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Explosivstoffe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
